1.altText: This photo is from a trip I took back in April of 2025 to Gatlinburg, Tennessee. Specifically, this photo was taken inside of the Great Smoky Mountains National Park while I was hiking with my lovely girlfriend, Jaclyn. We did not end up making it to our final destination, however, we did hike a good 6 or so miles. This photo was taken at the base of a beautiful waterfall.
